comment.author: 19114153@N06
comment._content: This series of photographs illustrating the loading of an HO4S aboard a USAF transport is very likely Bureau Number 129017, judging from a partial view of "017" in one of the series. This makes sense as this aircraft, originally delivered to the USMC as an HRS-2 in January 1952, served as an HO4S at NAS Argentia, Newfoundland from March 1961 to December 1962.
